PresentationReceiver

This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The PresentationReceiver interface of the the Presentation API provides a means for a receiving browsing context to access controlling browsing contexts and communicate with them.

Properties

PresentationReceiver.connectionList Read only
Returns a Promise that resolves with a PresentationConnectionList object containing a list of incoming presentation connections.

Specifications

Specification Status Comment
Presentation API
The definition of 'PresentationReceiver' in that specification.		 Candidate Recommendation Initial definition.
